p: Patients with PD were enrolled from the neurological clinics of Chang Gung Memorial Hospital, Linkou Medical Center. PD patients were diagnosed according to the UK PD Society Brain Bank clinical diagnostic criteria [ 10]. We also recruited age and ethnic-matched unrelated healthy individuals as control subjects. PD was categorized into early-onset PD (EOPD) with an age at onset of â‰¤50 years and late-onset PD (LOPD) with an age at onset of 50 years.
